channel.title: @kamran-ahmed on Cash Weaver
channel.description: Recent content in @kamran-ahmed on Cash Weaver

item.title: Levels of Seniority
item.description: Summary The most important traits that you need to have in order to step up in your career are: not settling with mediocrity, having an open mindset, being humble, learning from your mistakes, working on the challenging problems and having an opportunity mindset rather than a complaining one. Notes I have seen fresh graduates having no industry experience get up to speed quickly and producing work of a Senior Engineer and I have seen Senior developers labeled “senior” merely because of their age and “years of experience”.
